skills.name: Dreamy Invitation
skills.description: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Puts the target to Sleep for 1 turn with a 50% chance. Recovers the Attack Bar by 50% if the enemy falls asleep after the attack.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage

skills.name: Strike of Rejection
skills.description: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Disturbs the HP Recovery of the target for 2 turns. Increases the damage by 50% if the target is asleep.

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skills.name: Blooming Nightmare
skills.description: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Attacks random targets 5 times. Each attack has a 80% chance to inflict Continuous Damage for 3 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.
